description: This file defines a simple Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for a notes management backend, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints such as welcome message, API documentation redirect, health status, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when the root endpoint is accessed.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns application health status indicating if the app is running.
